thread.title: Huge fight erupts at Philadelphia subway station
thread.title_full: Huge fight erupts at Philadelphia subway station

author: MINYVONNE BURKE
title: Huge fight erupts at Philadelphia subway station
text:
SEE IT: Huge fight erupts at Philadelphia subway station, leaving three people injured Huge fight erupts at Philadelphia subway station  12 AM 
A group of teenagers were caught on camera violently beating up at least two people at a Philadelphia subway stop. 
SEPTA released the disturbing video on Sunday showing several teenage boys fighting at the Race and Vine Street stop on the Broad Street Line. 
In the video, a group of teens are seen kicking and stomping a person on the ground while another group of youngsters throw punches at someone else. 
Bystanders are heard screaming at the teens to stop fighting. A group of teenagers were seen in a video fighting at a Philadelphia subway stop. (Tommy Rowan/Youtube) 
The scuffle happened Thursday and SEPTA Transit Police are still searching for those involved in the brawl. 
Authorities released eight stills from the video hoping the public can help identify some of the teens involved in the fight so they can be interviewed. 
According to Philly.com , the fight began around 3:45 p.m. and was sparked by a snowball fight out on the street. The brawl then moved to the subway station's mezzanine level. 
SEPTA officials said at least three people were hurt in the fight, two of whom were hospitalized with minor injuries. 
So far, no arrests have been made. Tags:
